thi-ap21:28.2: balimajjhāsayo → khalitajjhāsayo (bj) | baliṃ paccāharaṃ (s2, s3) | mālapaccāhataṃ (pts1)
thi-ap21:33.3: Na ca dāni puno atthi → taṃ vandāmi puna natthi (s2, s3)
thi-ap21:36.3: Migaṃ uṇṇā yathā evaṃ → cittapuṇṇāyatāneva (s2, s3) | migaṃ puṇṇāyateneva (pts1)
thi-ap21:48.4: īdisaṃ cintayiṃ → iti saṃcintayiṃ (bj, s2, s3) | iti sañcintayiṃ (pts1)
